Class MicroOp

java.lang.Object
microsim.simulation.component.processor.MicroOp
public class MicroOp extends Object
Implements a micro operation (microop) the Processor can execute. Each instruction is split into one or more microops.

      private int inst
      Instruction this microop translates. Is used to fetch instruction-specific fields at execution time.
